revision.text:
<!--성우_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = VoiceActor
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 본명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
    	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 별명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:nick }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국적 | ontologyProperty = nationality }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 생일 | ontologyProperty = birthDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출신지 | ontologyProperty = birthPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망 | ontologyProperty = deathDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망지 | ontologyProperty = deathPlace }}
	{{DateIntervalMapping | templateProperty = 활동기간 | startDateOntologyProperty = activeYearsStartYear | endDateOntologyProperty = activeYearsEndYear }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = URL | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}
end}}

<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 데뷔작   = 
| 대표작   = 
| 소속     = 
-->
